item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy Introduction Personal data (usually referred to just as “data” below) is any information related to you which by itself or in cumulation with other pieces of information gives the opportunity to the person that collects and processes such information to identify you as a person. It can be your name, your identification number, your location data, or information related to your physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social life.
